theInvoker:Quas.NAME: Quas
theInvoker:Quas.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 theinvoker:Invokable Quas Orb. NL Gain !M! Repair while channeled.

theInvoker:Wex.NAME: Wex
theInvoker:Wex.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 theinvoker:Invokable Wex Orb. NL Enemies lose !M! Strength while channeled.

theInvoker:Exort.NAME: Exort
theInvoker:Exort.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 theinvoker:Invokable Exort Orb. NL Gain !M! Strength while channeled.

theInvoker:Alacrity.NAME: Alacrity
theInvoker:Alacrity.DESCRIPTION: theinvoker:Spell. NL Your next basic Attack card is played !M! times.

theInvoker:Cataclysm.NAME: Cataclysm
theInvoker:Cataclysm.DESCRIPTION: theinvoker:Spell. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

theInvoker:ChaosMeteor.NAME: Chaos Meteor
theInvoker:ChaosMeteor.DESCRIPTION: theinvoker:Spell. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

theInvoker:DeafeningBlast.DESCRIPTION: theinvoker:Spell. NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

theInvoker:EMP.NAME: E.M.P.
theInvoker:EMP.DESCRIPTION: theinvoker:Spell. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies.

theInvoker:ForgeSpirit.NAME: Forge Spirit
theInvoker:ForgeSpirit.DESCRIPTION: theinvoker:Spell. At the end of each turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

theInvoker:IceWall.NAME: Ice Wall
theInvoker:IceWall.DESCRIPTION: theinvoker:Spell. NL Apply Slow to all enemies.

theInvoker:Tornado.NAME: Tornado
theInvoker:Tornado.DESCRIPTION: theinvoker:Spell. NL Deal !M! damage and dispel all buffs.

theInvoker:HandOfMidas.NAME: Hand of Midas
theInvoker:HandOfMidas.DESCRIPTION: Kill an enemy with !M! or fewer HP. NL If Fatal, gain gold equal to its prior HP. NL Exhaust.

theInvoker:OrbOfVenom.NAME: Orb of Venom
theInvoker:OrbOfVenom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack an enemy, apply !M! Poison. NL theinvoker:Combines with

theInvoker:OrbOfCorrosionRecipe.DESCRIPTION: Doubles Orb of Venom Poison. theinvoker:Craftable from

theInvoker:OrbOfCorrosion.NAME: Orb of Corrosion
theInvoker:OrbOfCorrosion.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack an enemy, apply !M! Poison.  Apply 8 Temporary_HP.  NL theinvoker:Crafted.

theInvoker:OrchidMalevolence.NAME: Orchid Malevolence
theInvoker:OrchidMalevolence.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and theinvoker:Silence. NL theinvoker:Crafted.

theInvoker:LotusOrb.NAME: Lotus Orb
theInvoker:LotusOrb.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 theinvoker:Reflect, !B! Block and !M! theinvoker:Energy_Boost. NL theinvoker:Crafted.

theInvoker:TownPortalScroll.NAME: Town Portal Scroll
theInvoker:TownPortalScroll.DESCRIPTION: Escape from a non-boss combat. NL Heal to full health. NL Skip the next !M! floors. NL theinvoker:Consumed.
theInvoker:TownPortalScroll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Escape from a non-boss combat. NL Heal to full health. NL Skip the next floor. NL theinvoker:Consumed.

theInvoker:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theInvoker:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theInvoker:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theInvoker:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theInvoker:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theInvoker:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theInvoker:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theInvoker:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theInvoker:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theInvoker:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theInvoker:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theInvoker:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theInvoker:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
